name: Asylum - Schizo - Torpedo
additionalNotes: Schizo is the aptly named mixed filler brand extension of the popular Asylum line of cigars. Available in both a maduro version with a rich black Mexican San Andres’ wrapper and Honduran filler and a tasty Nicaraguan puro, you will probably start arguing with yourself about whether or not it’s a long filler or short filler cigar. There is your emotional part telling you what a great cigar it is. Schizo have the flavorful smoke as subtle notes of leather, cream, and spices with just a hint of cocoa covers your palate.
